text.autoconfig.craftlytics.title: Craftlytics Config
text.autoconfig.craftlytics.option.showW: Show a yellow warning text on the main menu and pause menu if one or more mods have Craftlytics enabled.
text.autoconfig.craftlytics.option.exclu: Exclude mods from analytics. A comma separated list of mod ids.
text.autoconfig.craftlytics.option.apiUr: The API to send analytics to.
text.craftlytics.warning: Â§eCraftlytics is enabled for one or more mods!
